title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: ControlExampleText widget emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior seems unexpected.
OB: Furthermore, clicking on other buttons triggers the same bell sound.
EB: Upon selecting SWT.MULTI, a Windows 'ding' sound is heard, indicating an error.
SR: Modify the ControlExampleText widget to eliminate the beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI, and ensure that no error sounds are emitted when interacting with the widget.
